original_text: Peter saw all the people who had come together. So he said to them, ‘People of Israel, you should not be so surprised about what you have seen. You should not look at us as if we ourselves are powerful. It is not because we obey God that we could cause this man to walk again.
korean_text: 베드로가 이것을 보고 백성에게 말하되 이스라엘 사람들아 이 일을 왜 놀랍게 여기느냐 우리 개인의 권능과 경건으로 이 사람을 걷게 한 것처럼 왜 우리를 주목하느냐

sentences.original_text: you should not be so surprised
You should not look at us
as if we ourselves are powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 우리 자신이 강력한 사람인 것처럼

sentences.original_text: It is not because we obey God
that we could cause this man to walk again
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이 사람을 다시 걷게 할 수 있었던 것은
